Resistance.display_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.
Resistance.display_target_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.

Psionic_Dart.display_help: The Psionic Dart has slowed your attack rate.

Psychic_Scream.display_help: The Psychic Scream has slowed your attack rate.

Mesmerize.display_help: The Suit painfully enraptures your mind with psychic energy rendering you unconscious.
Mesmerize.display_target_help: The Suit painfully enraptures your mind with psychic energy rendering you unconscious.

Dominate.display_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.
Dominate.display_target_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.

Aura_of_Empowerment.display_help: While this power is active, your chance to hit and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes. You must be at least level 14 and have Maneuvers or Assault before selecting Tactics.
Aura_of_Empowerment.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.

Resistance.display_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.
Resistance.display_target_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.

Nimble_Slash_Low.display_help: A quick swipe with your blades. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. This attack is needed for the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Ablating_Strike_Low.display_help: You Slash at your foe with your blades, dealing a good amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This power is needed for the Empower and Weaken combination attacks, and is the beginning of the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Ablating_Strike_Low.display_target_help: The blades have reduced your Defenses.

Nimble_Slash.display_help: A quick swipe with your blades. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. This attack is needed for the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Ablating_Strike.display_help: You Slash at your foe with your blades, dealing a good amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This power is needed for the Empower and Weaken combination attacks, and is the beginning of the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Ablating_Strike.display_target_help: The blades have reduced your Defenses.

Sweeping_Strike.display_help: You make a sweeping strike with your blades, hitting all foes in a cone in front of you and dealing moderate lethal damage to each. This power is the finishing move for the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Moderate

Air_Cutter.display_help: The Sword Master cuts the very air, causing a blade of wind to slash their foes.

Vest.display_help: Gunslingers wear an advanced Vest that protects them from all damage except psionics.
Vest.display_target_help: Gunslingers wear an advanced vest that protects them from all damage except psionics.

Incendiary_Round.display_help: The Gunslingers Incendiary round has ignited you!

Explosive_Tip.display_help: Explosive Tip rounds can affect foes in a small area. The force of the explosion can knock down foes.

Rapid_Fire.display_help: The Gunslinger can fire off a quick burst of lead in a wide cone.

Resistance.display_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.
Resistance.display_target_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.

Punch.display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.
Punch.display_target_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.

Buckshot.display_help: Good at close range. Fires a cone of buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down.

Slug.display_help: Fires a single Slug at a targeted foe. Firing a single Slug is slower than firing a Burst, but deals more damage, is longer range, and can knock down foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Resistance.display_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.
Resistance.display_target_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.

Flares.display_help: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.
Flares.display_target_help: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.

Fire_Blast.display_help: You have been set on fire by the Fire Blast.
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You have been set on fire by the Fire Blast.

Scorch.display_help: You are on fire and taking Damage over Time.
Scorch.display_target_help: You are on fire and taking Damage over Time.

Siphon_Power.display_help: The Pyrokineticist has siphoned your power and reduced your damage potential to strengthen his own.
Siphon_Power.display_target_help: The Pyrokineticist has siphoned your power and reduced your damage potential to strengthen his own.

Resistance.display_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.
Resistance.display_target_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.

Kinetic_Shackles.display_help: Your movement and recharge rate have been slowed by the Kinetic Shackles, and they continue to crush you.
Kinetic_Shackles.display_target_help: Your movement and recharge rate have been slowed by the Kinetic Shackles, and they continue to crush you.

Force_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Kinetic_Strike.display_help: The Telekineticist strikes their foe in melee and saps some of their damage potential.
Kinetic_Strike.display_target_help: Your damage potential has been reduced by the Kinetic Strike.

Siphon_Speed.display_help: The Telekinetic has siphoned your speed to increase their own.
Siphon_Speed.display_target_help: The Telekinetic has siphoned your speed to increase their own.

Storm_Kick.display_help: Unleashes a flurry of quick kicks to pummel your foe.
Storm_Kick.display_target_help: Unleashes a flurry of quick kicks to pummel your foe.

Burst_Low.display_help: The machine pistol has reduced your defense.
Burst_Low.display_target_help: The machine pistol has reduced your defense.

Burst.display_help: The machine pistol has reduced your defense.
Burst.display_target_help: The machine pistol has reduced your defense.

Gamblers_Cut.display_help: You perform a quick slash with your Ninja Blade. This attack is very fast, but deals only minor lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Gamblers_Cut.display_target_help: The sword has reduced your defense.

Gamblers_Cut_High.display_help: You perform a quick slash with your Ninja Blade. This attack is very fast, but deals only minor lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Gamblers_Cut_High.display_target_help: The sword has reduced your defense.

Pistol_Whip.display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

Dual_Shot_Low.display_help: Fires both pistols at once at a time target. Firing both pistols at once is slower than a single shot, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Dual_Shot.display_help: Fires both pistols at once at a time target. Firing both pistols at once is slower than a single shot, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Single_Shot.display_help: Fires both pistols at once at a time target. Firing both pistols at once is slower than a single shot, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Single_Shot.display_short_help: Ranged, Light DMG(Lethal), Chance for Foe Knockdown
Single_Shot.display_target_help: You have been knocked from your feet.

Resistance_Low.display_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.
Resistance_Low.display_target_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.

Resistance.display_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.
Resistance.display_target_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.

Gamblers_Cut.display_help: You perform a quick slash with your Ninja Blade. This attack is very fast, but deals only minor lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Gamblers_Cut.display_target_help: The sword has reduced your defense.

Sting_of_the_Wasp.display_help: You perform a standard attack with your Ninja Blade. This attack is slower than Gambler's Cut, but deals more lethal damage. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Sting_of_the_Wasp.display_target_help: The sword has reduced your defense.

Resistance.display_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.
Resistance.display_target_help: Members of the Syndicate have a psychic origin and have a resistance to psionic attacks.

Resist_Knockaround.display_help: Syndicate bosses have a preternatural balance of mind and body, preventing them from being knocked around or from running away in fear.
Resist_Knockaround.display_target_help: Syndicate bosses have a preternatural balance of mind and body, preventing them from being knocked around or from running away in fear.

Thunder_Kick.display_help: You strike your opponent with a fast kick that causes smashing damage. The speed of this attack could catch your opponent unawares, stunning them briefly.
Thunder_Kick.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smashing), Chance to Stun (Foe)

Storm_Kick.display_help: You strike your opponent with a roundhouse kick that causes smashing damage and has the chance to knock the target down.
Storm_Kick.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Crane_Kick.display_help: You strike your opponent with a slow kick that causes smashing damage and can knock your target back.
Crane_Kick.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Dragons_Tail.display_help: This low spinning kick deals slightly more damage than Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits may trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Smashing), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Dull_Pain.display_help: Channeling your personal training, you become nearly impervious to pain. This has the effect of increasing your maximum hitpoints for a time.

Aimed_Shot.display_help: You fire a well aimed shot at a single target, causing lethal damage.
Aimed_Shot.display_target_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than the Talon Snap Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Fistful_of_Arrows.display_help: You fire a fistful of arrows at foes in a cone in front of you, causing lethal damage to each target you hit.

Blazing_Arrow.display_help: You fire an arrow wreathed in flame at a foe. The target suffers lethal damage and is set ablaze, suffering fire damage over time.
Blazing_Arrow.display_target_help: You are suffering fire damage over time.
